WE BUILD THINGS DIFFERENTLY

We can service all of your construction needs

Bauer Construction is a full service construction company offering building solutions from start to finish. Our staff has been operating on NYC for ten years.

From contract delivery alternatives to progressive preconstruction and tech-driven construction services, Bauer offers clients flexible options that keep information flowing, teammates collaborating, and projects on track.

OUR COMPANY
